Distribution on the 1st of the month is only for those who also receive cash assistance AND have their cash benefits deposited to their own bank account instead of on their EBT account

The majority of SNAP benefits were distributed on the 1st of the month, with special cases getting their benefits between the 11th and 23rd, up through February 2010. In 2010, the distribution was spread more evenly over the distribution period, and in 2014, the distribution dates were changed slightly.
